title: Random Disconnects
body:
I've had issues today with randomly being disconnected while in-game (happened twice today in five games).

First time it happened, I exited the game and tried to reconnect from client. I got some message about some RADS error, and was forced to completely restart the client in order to reconnect.

Second time I was able to reconnect from the client without any error messages. Although when I did get back in the game I had an odd bug where the old and new SR music started playing on top of each other.

Is there anything I can do to fix this?

replies.body:
The issues you're describing, especially the RADS error and old game sounds leads me to believe that you have corrupt or old files in your League installation. I recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to resolve these issues.

Let me know the results of those steps being taken.

P.S. Your post was edited due to it including the netalyzr link (which contains your real IP address). Please avoid posting these types of links in the future, for your own safety and security.
